project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the user will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add a contact
Implement the functionality to search for a contact
Implement the functionality to update a contact
Implement the functionality to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling for storing contacts
Create a terminal interface for the user to interact with
Write tests for each of the functionalities implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they function correctly
